name: idoLiv - Next Idol Star Life
description:
Life is full of wonder isn't it?

Meet an unique idol making simulation RPG game, Idoliv - Next Idol Star Life.

You will be take a role to be an idol who lost her memory.

What you have to do:

- Raise her and discover her secret.

- Train her and build her career.

- Through the story you will find many heart-warming events.

- Don’t miss fashionista! Many items and styles are available for dress-up and make-up.

- You can get ending with guys and you will surprise!

- So many things to enjoy! Let’s try!

Please support my indie game! I made with loves!
